I probably have a hundred but I'm only going to give you one [laughter] I applied for a position one time that I really wanted I mean I really really wanted it and I wasn't taken I wouldn't say I was a turning to God for guidance because I really was it
Was a good job and it would be a blessing to many people so I ... I felt guided to apply it was a good idea to do it but then I wasn't taken and I didn't see it at the time how much I have yet to learn about not pushing my own will to go faster or further than God was leading me at the moment
But even when I didn't get what I wanted God really was leading me
And in fact leading me to apply several more times for the very same job
Each time there was no
And while it was disappointing each know compelled me to appreciate the good that was at hand and to learn to develop the opportunities that were before me I learned actually that I can bloom anywhere
I can bloom anywhere that God plants me and that was really a good and healthy lesson to learn now the last time I applied
I remember clearly asking God if I should even bother should I even try again
And the intuition came to me that in following God's leading I should apply but that it was also safe to trust that God was leading others those whose job it is to decide if I get to do it or not
And you know I never thought of that my focus has always been so narrow just on guide guiding me and my really wanting to do it but that wasn't my decision God was leading me to apply and that was enough
I felt the love and my heart I felt God's love for everyone in the decision making process I trusted them because I trusted God to be guiding them so I applied and that time I was taken
But you know what I now know I actually would have been fine even if the answered been no because I could see God was taking the lead at every single point
In hindsight I can see how different my circumstances where how much better prepared I was on how I wouldn't have had the same richer experience in that work had I been taking any of those other times that I asked
God's guidance is such a precious thing to seek it's an ...
